metadata.title: CVE-2021-21844 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple exploitable integer overflow vulnerabilities exist within theMPEG-4 decoding functionality of the GPAC Project on Advanced Contentlibrary v1.0.1. A specially crafted MPEG-4 input when encountering an atomusing the “stco” FOURCC code, can cause an integer overflow due tounchecked arithmetic resulting in a heap-based buffer overflow that causesmemory corruption. An attacker can convince a user to open a video totrigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
